title: Assignment 1
text:
My first assignment has three parts.


Mr.Â BaydoÄŸan discusses data science and industrial engineering through real-life applications. He presents various real-world problems and explains the data analysis process step by step, using concrete examples to illustrate each stage.
One of the key topics covered is the difference between traditional machine learning and deep learning. BaydoÄŸan highlights their distinct features and applications, emphasizing when and why deep learning might be preferable.
He provides detailed case studies, such as:

Electricity markets: How predictive models help balance electricity supply and demand.
Lumber industry: Using data-driven methods to predict wood curvature and optimize production.
E-commerce ranking algorithms: How machine learning can optimize revenue by improving product rankings on online marketplaces.
Physics-informed machine learning: Integrating scientific principles with AI models for better predictions.
Machine learning for optimization: Applying ML techniques to enhance decision-making in industrial processes.

The session concludes with a Q&A segment, where students ask for guidance on specializing in data science. BaydoÄŸan emphasizes the importance of practice, suggesting that real-world applications, projects, and continuous learning are key to mastering the field. He also recommends â€œAn Introduction to Statistical Learningâ€ as a fundamental resource for beginners looking to develop a strong foundation in machine learning and data analysis.




# compute_stats fonksiyonunu tanÄ±mla
compute_stats <- function(x) {
  stats <- list(
    mean = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE),       # Ortalama
    median = median(x, na.rm = TRUE),   # Medyan
    variance = var(x, na.rm = TRUE),    # Varyans
    IQR = IQR(x, na.rm = TRUE),         # Ã‡eyrekler ArasÄ± AralÄ±k
    min = min(x, na.rm = TRUE),         # Minimum DeÄŸer
    max = max(x, na.rm = TRUE)          # Maksimum DeÄŸer
  )
  return(stats)
}

# compute_stats fonksiyonunun Ã¶rnek kullanÄ±mÄ±nÄ± dÃ¼zenli ÅŸekilde gÃ¶stermek
stats_mpg <- compute_stats(mtcars$mpg)

# SonuÃ§larÄ± dÃ¼zenli ÅŸekilde yazdÄ±r
stats_mpg_df <- data.frame(
  Mean = stats_mpg$mean,
  Median = stats_mpg$median,
  Variance = stats_mpg$variance,
  IQR = stats_mpg$IQR,
  Min = stats_mpg$min,
  Max = stats_mpg$max
)

stats_mpg_df

      Mean Median Variance   IQR  Min  Max
1 20.09062   19.2  36.3241 7.375 10.4 33.9



# BoÅŸ bir data frame oluÅŸtur
results <- data.frame()

# For dÃ¶ngÃ¼sÃ¼ ile tÃ¼m sayÄ±sal sÃ¼tunlara compute_stats fonksiyonunu uygula
for (col in colnames(mtcars)) {
  if (is.numeric(mtcars[[col]])) {  # Sadece sayÄ±sal sÃ¼tunlarÄ± iÅŸle
    stats <- compute_stats(mtcars[[col]])  # compute_stats fonksiyonunu uygula
    stats <- unlist(stats)  # Ä°statistikleri dÃ¼z bir vektÃ¶re Ã§evir
    results <- rbind(results, stats)  # SonuÃ§larÄ± data frame'e ekle
  }
}

# SÃ¼tun isimlerini dÃ¼zenle
colnames(results) <- c("Mean", "Median", "Variance", "IQR", "Min", "Max")
rownames(results) <- colnames(mtcars)[sapply(mtcars, is.numeric)]

# SonuÃ§larÄ± yazdÄ±r

title: Assignment 1
text:
Mr.Â BaydoÄŸan discusses data science and industrial engineering through real-life applications. He presents various real-world problems and explains the data analysis process step by step, using concrete examples to illustrate each stage.
One of the key topics covered is the difference between traditional machine learning and deep learning. BaydoÄŸan highlights their distinct features and applications, emphasizing when and why deep learning might be preferable.
He provides detailed case studies, such as:

Electricity markets: How predictive models help balance electricity supply and demand.
Lumber industry: Using data-driven methods to predict wood curvature and optimize production.
E-commerce ranking algorithms: How machine learning can optimize revenue by improving product rankings on online marketplaces.
Physics-informed machine learning: Integrating scientific principles with AI models for better predictions.
Machine learning for optimization: Applying ML techniques to enhance decision-making in industrial processes.

The session concludes with a Q&A segment, where students ask for guidance on specializing in data science. BaydoÄŸan emphasizes the importance of practice, suggesting that real-world applications, projects, and continuous learning are key to mastering the field. He also recommends â€œAn Introduction to Statistical Learningâ€ as a fundamental resource for beginners looking to develop a strong foundation in machine learning and data analysis.

title: Assignment 1
text:
# compute_stats fonksiyonunu tanÄ±mla
compute_stats <- function(x) {
  stats <- list(
    mean = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE),       # Ortalama
    median = median(x, na.rm = TRUE),   # Medyan
    variance = var(x, na.rm = TRUE),    # Varyans
    IQR = IQR(x, na.rm = TRUE),         # Ã‡eyrekler ArasÄ± AralÄ±k
    min = min(x, na.rm = TRUE),         # Minimum DeÄŸer
    max = max(x, na.rm = TRUE)          # Maksimum DeÄŸer
  )
  return(stats)
}

# compute_stats fonksiyonunun Ã¶rnek kullanÄ±mÄ±nÄ± dÃ¼zenli ÅŸekilde gÃ¶stermek
stats_mpg <- compute_stats(mtcars$mpg)

# SonuÃ§larÄ± dÃ¼zenli ÅŸekilde yazdÄ±r
stats_mpg_df <- data.frame(
  Mean = stats_mpg$mean,
  Median = stats_mpg$median,
  Variance = stats_mpg$variance,
  IQR = stats_mpg$IQR,
  Min = stats_mpg$min,
  Max = stats_mpg$max
)

stats_mpg_df

      Mean Median Variance   IQR  Min  Max
1 20.09062   19.2  36.3241 7.375 10.4 33.9



# BoÅŸ bir data frame oluÅŸtur
results <- data.frame()

# For dÃ¶ngÃ¼sÃ¼ ile tÃ¼m sayÄ±sal sÃ¼tunlara compute_stats fonksiyonunu uygula
for (col in colnames(mtcars)) {
  if (is.numeric(mtcars[[col]])) {  # Sadece sayÄ±sal sÃ¼tunlarÄ± iÅŸle
    stats <- compute_stats(mtcars[[col]])  # compute_stats fonksiyonunu uygula
    stats <- unlist(stats)  # Ä°statistikleri dÃ¼z bir vektÃ¶re Ã§evir
    results <- rbind(results, stats)  # SonuÃ§larÄ± data frame'e ekle
  }
}

# SÃ¼tun isimlerini dÃ¼zenle
colnames(results) <- c("Mean", "Median", "Variance", "IQR", "Min", "Max")
rownames(results) <- colnames(mtcars)[sapply(mtcars, is.numeric)]

# SonuÃ§larÄ± yazdÄ±r
results

cyl    6.187500   6.000 3.189516e+00   4.00000  4.000   8.000
disp 230.721875 196.300 1.536080e+04 205.17500 71.100 472.000
hp   146.687500 123.000 4.700867e+03  83.50000 52.000 335.000
drat   3.596563   3.695 2.858814e-01   0.84000  2.760   4.930
wt     3.217250   3.325 9.573790e-01   1.02875  1.513   5.424
qsec  17.848750  17.710 3.193166e+00   2.00750 14.500  22.900
vs     0.437500   0.000 2.540323e-01   1.00000  0.000   1.000

2.3.3 Dataset 3: sebep_mudurluk_sayisal_2023

title: PROJE: TÃ¼rkiyeâ€™de Orman YangÄ±nlarÄ± Analizi (1988â€“2023)
text:
2.5 Veri Ã–n Ä°ÅŸleme
Verileri R ortamÄ±na aktarÄ±rken aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki adÄ±mlar uygulanmÄ±ÅŸtÄ±r:

Dosya Ä°simlerini DÃ¼zenleme: TRâ€™de dosya isimlerinde TÃ¼rkÃ§e karakterler (Ã§, ÄŸ, Ã¼, Ã¶, ÅŸ, Ä±) bazen hata oluÅŸturduÄŸundan dolayÄ± dosya isimlerindeki TÃ¼rkÃ§e karakterleri Ä°ngilizce karakterlere Ã§evrildi. Ã–rneÄŸin: â€œbÃ¶lge_mudurluklerine_sayisal_olarak_2004_2023.xlsxâ€ dosyasÄ±nÄ± â€œbolge_mudurluklerine_sayisal_olarak_2004_2023.xlsxâ€ olarak deÄŸiÅŸtirildi.
Veri Temizleme: Excel dosyalarÄ±ndaki gereksiz aÃ§Ä±klamalar, gÃ¶rseller, boÅŸ satÄ±rlar gibi analizle ilgisi olmayan iÃ§erikleri silindi. BÃ¶ylece veri setlerinin doÄŸrudan okunabilir ve iÅŸlenebilir hale gelmesini saÄŸlandÄ±.
SÃ¼tun Ä°simlerini DÃ¼zenleme: o SÃ¼tun isimlerindeki TÃ¼rkÃ§e karakterleri Ä°ngilizce karakterlerle deÄŸiÅŸtirdim (Åehir yerine Sehir, BÃ¶lge yerine Bolge gibi). o AyrÄ±ca sÃ¼tun adlarÄ±nÄ± daha aÃ§Ä±klayÄ±cÄ± hale getirdim. Ã–rneÄŸin: yangÄ±n sebeplerine gÃ¶re ihmal, kaza, kasÄ±t ana kategorilerini detaylandÄ±rarak ÅŸu ÅŸekilde isimlendirdim: ï‚§ ihmal_copluk, ihmal_avcilik ï‚§ kaza_trafik, kaza_enerji ï‚§ kasit_yangin, kasit_aniz
Veri YapÄ±sÄ±nÄ± DÃ¼zenleme: AynÄ± kategorideki veriler bir araya getirildi.
Veri Ä°Ã§e Aktarma: read.xlsx() fonksiyonu ile xlsx paketinden veriler aktarÄ±ldÄ± (encoding = "UTF-8" kullanÄ±ldÄ±).
Planlanan Ä°leri Ã–n Ä°ÅŸleme AdÄ±mlarÄ±:

Veri tiplerinin dÃ¼zenlenmesi (character, numeric vs.),
Eksik verileri (NA) belirleyip, gerekirse temizlemek,
Kategorik deÄŸiÅŸkenlerin faktÃ¶r (factor) formatÄ±na Ã§evrilmesi.

title: Tï¿½rkiyeâ€™de Orman Yanginlari Analizi (1988ï¿½2023)
text:
1.1 Problem Tanimi
Tï¿½rkiyeï¿½de orman yanginlari hem ï¿½evresel hem de ekonomik ciddi sonuï¿½lar dogurmaktadir. Bu ï¿½alisma ile: - 1988ï¿½2023 yillari arasindaki yangin nedenlerinin ve yanan alanlarin degisimi, - 2023 yilina ï¿½zel bï¿½lgesel ve niteliksel yangin dagilimlari, - Yangin sonrasi silvikï¿½ltï¿½rel uygulamalar analiz edilecektir.

title: Tï¿½rkiyeâ€™de Orman Yanginlari Analizi (1988ï¿½2023)
text:
2.1 2.1 Veri Kaynagi
Veriler, Orman Genel Mï¿½dï¿½rlï¿½gï¿½ (OGM) tarafindan yayimlanan resmi Excel dosyalarindan alinmistir.

Orman Genel Mï¿½dï¿½rlï¿½gï¿½ Resmi Web Sitesi
Veri dosyalari: ï¿½esitli Excel (.xlsx) formatindadir.

title: Tï¿½rkiyeâ€™de Orman Yanginlari Analizi (1988ï¿½2023)
text:
2.2 2.2 Veriye Erisim
Ilgili .RData dosyasina asagidaki baglantidan ulasabilirsiniz:
???? Yangin Verileri RData Dosyasi

title: Tï¿½rkiyeâ€™de Orman Yanginlari Analizi (1988ï¿½2023)
text:
2.5 2.5 Veri ï¿½n Isleme
Verileri R ortamina aktarirken asagidaki adimlar uygulanmistir:

Dosya Isimlerini Dï¿½zenleme: Tï¿½rkï¿½e karakterler Ingilizce karakterlere ï¿½evrildi.
Veri Temizleme: Excel dosyalarindaki gereksiz aï¿½iklamalar, gï¿½rseller ve bos satirlar silindi.
Sï¿½tun Isimlerini Dï¿½zenleme: Sï¿½tun isimleri hem Ingilizcelestirildi hem de aï¿½iklayici hale getirildi.
Veri Yapisini Dï¿½zenleme: Ayni kategorideki veriler bir araya getirildi.
Veri Iï¿½e Aktarma: read.xlsx() fonksiyonu ile xlsx paketinden veriler aktarildi (encoding = "UTF-8" kullanildi).
Planlanan Ileri ï¿½n Isleme Adimlari:

Veri tiplerinin dï¿½zenlenmesi (character, numeric vs.),
Eksik verilerin belirlenmesi ve islenmesi,
Kategorik degiskenlerin faktï¿½r (factor) formatina ï¿½evrilmesi.

title: Tï¿½rkiyeâ€™de Orman Yanginlari Analizi (1988ï¿½2023)
text:
3.1 3.1 Kesifsel Veri Analizi (Exploratory Data Analysis)
Veri setlerindeki genel egilimler, dagilimlar ve iliskiler incelenecektir.
